question: India's Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) will launch the country's first crude oil options contract on which date?
explanation: India's Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) will launch the country's first crude oil options contract on May 15. India is the world's third-biggest consumer of crude oil. Crude oil futures contracts were most traded on the exchange platform in 2017/18 fiscal year ended on March 31. The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has approved the options contract.
